items.title: US yet to approve any help following Afghanistan earthquake, sources say

Now after three months the price is finally coming back down, and while we have seen it go lower in the past, you’re still looking at a solid $70 price cut to the best rate we’ve tracked in 2025.

items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Amazon that drops 8BitDo’s latest all-button low-profile arcade controller down to $80.99 shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. It hit the scene earlier this year in May carrying a $90 price tag and has held steady at that price ever since. Today’s deal finally changes that, taking 10% off and dropping it by $9. While it’s not a massive drop, it’s notable as the first offer we’ve tracked and makes it a little easier on your wallet. The officially-licensed Xbox variant of this model is also seeing its first discount at $89.99 shipped, down from its usual price of $100. Head below for more details.
